Package ohos.ace.ability

Provides basic classes to implement functions such as page loading, and event and life cycle management.

This package provides rich polymorphic components and APIs for you to develop applications on different types of devices. Application development is made possible yet simple with templates and display components.

Since:
1
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AceInternalAbility.AceInternalAbilityHandler
    Handles the requests from the local ability to call an internal ability.
    LocalParticleAbility
    Represents local particle abilities (PA) that are integrated into the JS UI framework.
    LocalParticleAbility.Callback
    Provides an asynchronous callback for LocalParticleAbility instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AceAbility
    Child class of Ability.
    AceInternalAbility
    Represents internal abilities that are integrated into the JS UI framework.
